name: Clonepoint
description:
Clonepoint is a Free(Libre) clone of Gunpoint, a game in which you hack and punch your way to victory.

The source code is available here:

https://github.com/rohit-n/Clonepoint

You can create your own Clonepoint levels with the Tiled map editor. See Modding.txt for more details.

Have fun!

UPDATE 1: Tutorial and input popups added.

UPDATE 2: Music! Backgrounds! Bug fixes! A new map! And Linux binaries!

With the release of Linux binaries, I will no longer distribute the source code here. You can get the latest code from the Github link above.
